thumb.title: 【音内つらら】ありがとう、でも余計なお世話【UTAUカバー/+UST】
thumb.description: 2:29 - I put the wrong line, sorry. The correct one is - 花や鳥は歌う君を恰好のネタにしてHello, I'm riot3121, and this is a debut of the Otouchi Tsurara derivative character - "Unstable Snow". At the start of the 2024, it was intented to be a "cyborg killer 8000" (my brain was too kiddish at that time), but now it's just an emo-cat which plays metal songs! Actually one of the reasons why did I make this character is that "Unstable Snow" is a kind of form of my negative emotions. She doesn't do bad things, but she's just melancholicYuta Kondo is my favorite producer ever! I love him a lot! I wish he came backThe program on the background is FL StudioThank you, CutieBeauty, for extracting the off vocal with audacity!Original by: cie／近藤雄太 - nm12143508 (reprint link - https://youtu.be/ogW74Y1BlaM)UST/tuning/mixing/illustration/PV by: riot3121Illustration - https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/133698567UST download - https://www.mediafire.com/file/ejdc92hwixrqy5p/Thank_You%252C_But_It%2527s_None_of_Your_Business_-_UST.zip/fileThank you for listening!
